findViewById<View>(R.id.tabDots) cannot be safely cast to TabLayout.
getSystemService(Context.LAYOUT_INFLATER_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to LayoutInflater.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

instances.message: This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (tableColumns != null && tableColumns.isNotEmpty()) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: tableColumns != null && tableColumns.isNotEmpty()
Parentheses in (tableData != null && tableData.isNotEmpty()) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: tableData != null && tableData.isNotEmpty()
Parentheses in (PrefManager.getBoolean(R.string.setting_mic_key, false)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: PrefManager.getBoolean(R.string.setting_mic_key, false)
Parentheses in (settingView?.micPermission()) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: settingView?.micPermission()
Parentheses in (actualNumberOfUsers * 100f) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: actualNumberOfUsers * 100f
Parentheses in (this) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: this
Parentheses in (this) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: this
Parentheses in (this) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: this
Parentheses around the lambda ({ it <= ' ' }) are unnecessary and can be removed.

smells.name: SpacingBetweenPackageAndImports
smells.description: Violation of the package declaration style.

instances.message: There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of FeedbackActivity.

smells.name: ProtectedMemberInFinalClass
smells.description: Member with protected visibility in final class is private. Consider using private or internal as modifier.

instances.message: Member with protected visibility in final class is private. Consider using private or internal as modifier.
Member with protected visibility in final class is private. Consider using private or internal as modifier.

smells.name: UseDataClass
smells.description: Classes that do nothing but hold data should be replaced with a data class.

instances.message: The class MapHelper defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.

smells.name: UtilityClassWithPublicConstructor
smells.description: The class declaration is unnecessary because it only contains utility functions. An object declaration should be used instead.

instances.message: The class NetworkUtils only contains utility functions. Consider defining it as an object.

smells.name: ForbiddenComment
smells.description: Flags a forbidden comment. Defaults values are TODO:, FIXME: or STOPSHIP:

instances.message: This comment contains text that has been defined as forbidden in detekt.
